pageContext.claim: “Thank you to the House Republicans for sticking together and the BIG WIN today on the Border. Today’s vote simply reaffirms Congressional Democrats are the party of Open Borders, Drugs and Crime!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is arguing that by opposing his emergency declaration to fund a border wall, Democrats are supporting open borders, drugs and crime. There's a real legal question whether Trump can use an emergency declaration to get around Congress's power to approve or reject spending items such as the wall, which Congress has refused to fund so far. Generally speaking, Democrats support tougher border security measures, just not Trump's wall. Almost all academic research on immigrants and crime shows that there's no support for Trump's repeated claims that immigration raises crime rates.
